article_title: Hobby Lobby sign a clue to what's happening at old JC Penney home store
article_text:
Hobby Lobby sign a clue to what's happening at old JC Penney home store

A "Coming Soon – Hobby Lobby" sign was spotted this week at the site of the former JC Penney Home Store on South Virginia Street, across from Meadowood Mall.

The Penney store closed in May 2013.

No details were available Saturday from the Hobby Lobby company.

The only other Nevada location of the big-box arts-and-crafts retailer is in Las Vegas. Find out more about the stores here .

Hobby Lobby, headquartered in Oklahoma City, has been in the news lately because it has appealed a contraceptive mandate that is part of the Affordable Care Act. The U.S. Supreme Court has said it will hear that case in March.

og.description: Spotted on South Virginia Street in Reno, at the site of the former JC Penney Home Store: A "Coming Soon - Hobby Lobby" sign. No details…
